title: Shawn Yue in Levi's® Cool Jeans / Levi's® Keep Cool ?? -????
description:
This spring, Levi's® is launching COOLMAX® and a collective range of COOL JEANS, an innovative denim collection specifically constructed to combat sweltering hot weather. With Levi's® COOL JEANS, everyone, everywhere has the opportunity to wear denim and non-denim styles year-round, regardless of the temperature. 

Engineered for comfort and woven with specialized fibers that create a cooling effect, these looks help adjust the body's temperature to maintain comfort amidst the summer heat, to KEEP you COOL from inside out. Hong Kong actor Shawn Yue(余文樂) demonstrated his persistence in pursuing own aspirations in the light-weighted and breathable Levi's® COOL JEANS.

asset.author: Levi's®
